channel.title: Ranged lvl up bug

item.title: Ranged lvl up bug
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zyle1992:

It looks like someone fudgeed up the ranged level up interface. Can you show us a picture of the quest tab dialogue normally?

Close…

What happen is that someone hardcoded a custom quest tab interface over the old one. And 2 of the id’s used in the quest tab interface are apparently also used on the ranged level up interface. I’ve done things like this in the past. Change the ID’s of the quest interface and it’ll fix everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranged lvl up bug
item.dc:creator: @Distryct Distryct
item.description:
@Distryct wrote:

Hello ,

When i get my lvl up dialogue for ranged i get 2 lines from my quest tab in the dialogue?
i couldn’t find it in my source files.
any help would be appreciated

case 4: sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranged level!", 5453); sendFrame126("Your ranged level is now " + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + ".", 6114); c.sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranging level."); sendFrame164(4443); if (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) { for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendClan("SERVER", c.playerName + " just advanced to " + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) + " Range!", "Global Chat", 2); } } } break;

lines that are showing up in the dialogue

[CODE]
getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Slayer Points: [@gre@"+SPoints+"@red@] “, 29166);
getPA().sendFrame126(”@red@Pest Control Points: [@gre@"+pcPoints+"@red@] ", 29173);

[/CODE]

Read full topic
